author: Gregory Stopka
text:
I have a member that works in the building Inspection division.  Recently the department took over the mandatory annual inspections for properties around a lake.  These inspections are to safe guard and prevent pollutant that may have the potential of contaminating the waters. 
There are three main inspections conducted: 1. Boathouses with plumbing; 2. OSSF (Septic Systems); 3. Insecticide Misting System.
Questions for local governments that have similar mandatory inspections program:

How do you conduct these inspections, do you have a process in place that is solid and is working yearly?  Can I have a copy of there process/procedures?
How many inspectors do you have assigned and doing these inspections? Do you have just one inspector assigned to conduct inspection annually or several?
What software do you use, to enter inspections, look up, and run reports?
How do you contact the property owners?

Thanks,
Greg Stopka, Central Regional Director
Alliance for innovation
title: Property Inspections by Lakes
